entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • stackalloc should be disallowed for structs with ref fields #63104
  • Code containing async lambda fails to update when defined in a reloadable type #63103
  • Generated IL for `&local` in an `async` method in debug contains a GC hole #63100

Closed

  • Provide option to disable Source Link for Go To Definition #59717
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Hot Reload: Fix reloadable type regression #63106
    Area-Interactive, 17.3

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63105
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add option to skip source link and embedded source #63089
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #63099
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/ConvertToRecord #63098
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #63097
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #63096
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #63095
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Check the right matches in lambdas #63006
    Area-Interactive
  • Update method invocation escape analysis to match spec changes #62886
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Support UnscopedRefAttribute #62783
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Filter only valid symbols for inheritance completions #62013
    Area-IDE, Community
